cards.title: Your First Letter
cards.writeup:
I made this coz I like letters but you can use it any how you want. Okay, there are multiple benefits to writing in this and I wonder where should I start. Sorry to have you here in the first place. I won't go deep in this. But, I just saw how easily this app made me write an apology. There are many stuffs you can do with it starting with yeah writing a long boring letter to your friend no matter what your mood is and letting them know how dodgy you feel.


Secondly, share them is this page to make their day as your letters are always on the first page and if not, copying the URL and sending it to your friends will give them a cozy vibe and may set their mood free, god knows.


Techies, this does not have a FAANG like load balancer, please don't break my site downðŸ¥º, You know what i mean.

cards.title: Eternal Embrace
cards.writeup:
With each passing day, my heart beats in harmony with your name. Your presence in my life is a cherished gift, a light that brightens even the darkest of moments.

Your laughter is the melody to which my soul dances, and your smile is the sunrise that warms my world. In your eyes, I find a love that words can't express.

Every shared moment with you is a treasure, a chapter in the story of us. I'm deeply grateful for the love we share, and I eagerly await the countless adventures that await us.

In your arms, I find home, and in your love, I find my purpose. With you, my heart has found its forever.
cards.closing: From the depths of my heart

cards.title: A Note
cards.writeup:
It's been a great week and a great work as of now, loved the UI the pallet and loading time is also almost negligible...

Great work

cards.title: Note
cards.writeup:
Hey girl, slow down for a secondâ€”I have some things I want to share.

Some stuff is going to happen to you. You wonâ€™t be able to plan for it, pencil it in your schedule for when is good for you, or always have someone pick up the phone to guide you through it. Youâ€™re going to have to just roll with the flow, take it in, glean lessons from it, and then carry on, head held high. Maybe journal on itâ€”sometimes insights donâ€™t come quick, but thereâ€™s something positive to be found from most experiences in life. Focus on that.

cards.title: Sorry not sorry
cards.writeup:
So, I may have stumbled into a mess, and I'm owning up to it. My bad! ðŸ™ˆ

But seriously, I hate the idea of us not being on the same page. Now stop being angry if you're very.

Turn your No to Yes. I am waiting.
